ch0015_90_takeshi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Glad to see you’re looking good today!
ch0015_90_takeshi/0101_0701_02_10:
Looks like you got a little stronger—again.
We won’t fall behind! We’ll show you the
results of our training!
ch0015_90_takeshi/7101_0701_01_10:
Me and my Pokémon’s greatest strength is
our true-grit determination.
ch0015_90_takeshi/7101_0701_02_10:
I believe that after hardship, there’s light at
the end of the tunnel. We’ll survive anything,
no matter how tough it is!
ch0015_90_takeshi/7101_0701_03_10:
That’s probably how I was able to awaken
my arc suit.
ch0015_90_takeshi/7102_0701_01_10:
When most people think of Kanto Trainers,
the first names that come to mind are
Red and Blue.
ch0015_90_takeshi/7102_0701_02_10:
On one hand, I’m proud of all the respect
they’ve earned. But on the other hand,
it’s frustrating.
ch0015_90_takeshi/7102_0701_03_10:
After all, I’m one of Kanto’s Gym Leaders,
and I carry that title with pride!
ch0015_90_takeshi/7102_0701_04_10:
I’ve got to show that Red and Blue aren’t
Kanto’s only strong Trainers!
ch0015_90_takeshi/7103_0701_01_10:
If the results of my training with Onix
manifested in this arc suit’s brilliance...
ch0015_90_takeshi/7103_0701_02_10:
don’t you think the muscles I’ve worked so
hard to build shine just as brightly?
ch0015_90_takeshi/7103_0701_03_10: Both are proof of hard work!
ch0015_90_takeshi/7104_0701_01_10:
With the bright shine of my arc suit, I can
work safely in dark places.
ch0015_90_takeshi/7104_0701_02_10:
Do you think Arceus would be mad if I
helped excavate fossils in my arc suit?
ch0015_90_takeshi/7105_0701_01_10:
Bonds have always been central
to our adventures together,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0015_90_takeshi/7105_0701_02_10:
From our battles against Lear—who rejected
the power of bonds—all the way up till
now, it’s been a valuable experience.
ch0015_90_takeshi/7105_0701_03_10:
I truly believe the path I walked with
you helped me grow my bonds with
my Pokémon.
ch0015_90_takeshi/1701_0701_01_10: Here, I’ve a gift for you!
ch0015_90_takeshi/1701_0702_01_10:
Let’s keep aiming for even greater heights!
I hope this gift keeps you motivated!
ch0015_90_takeshi/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that people call Arceus “the
creator of all things.”
ch0015_90_takeshi/2501_0701_02_10:
If it has that kind of power, do you think
it could create a boulder that’s impossible
to break? Or even scratch?
ch0015_90_takeshi/2501_0702_01_10:
Regardless, it’s fun to think about that kinda
stuff, isn’t it!
ch0015_90_takeshi/2501_0702_02_10:
If you could ask Arceus for anything, what
would it be?
ch0015_90_takeshi/2511_0701_01_10:
On Pasio, there are Trainers so powerful,
my defenses can’t stop them.
ch0015_90_takeshi/2511_0701_02_10:
What do you think is the best way to handle
strong attacks?
ch0015_90_takeshi/2511_0701_03_10:
The answer’s simple! Strengthen your
defenses and prevent them!
ch0015_90_takeshi/2511_0702_01_10:
Me and my Rock-type Pokémon will
withstand anything—and win!
ch0015_90_takeshi/2511_0702_02_10: I’ll stand by that with my rock-hard will!
ch0015_90_takeshi/3001_0701_01_10:
I think it’s good to have days when you
decide to do something and see it through!
ch0015_90_takeshi/3003_0701_01_10:
No matter how small, every bit of effort
will always pay off!
ch0015_90_takeshi/3005_0701_01_10:
You’ve exceeded my expectations.
You keep getting better every day!
